description: Update lens review for a particular workload.

parameters.name: WorkloadId
parameters.description: The ID assigned to the workload. This ID is unique within an Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: LensAlias
parameters.description: The alias of the lens. For Amazon Web Services official lenses, this is either the lens alias, such as serverless, or the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-east-1::lens/serverless. Note that some operations (such as ExportLens and CreateLensShare) are not permitted on Amazon Web Services official lenses. For custom lenses, this is the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-west-2:123456789012:lens/0123456789abcdef01234567890abcdef. Each lens is identified by its  LensSummary$LensAlias.

parameters.name: LensNotes
parameters.description: The notes associated with the workload. For a review template, these are the notes that will be associated with the workload when the template is applied.

parameters.name: PillarNotes
parameters.description: List of pillar notes of a lens review in a workload. For a review template, these are the notes that will be associated with the workload when the template is applied. (string) --- The ID used to identify a pillar, for example, security. A pillar is identified by its  PillarReviewSummary$PillarId. (string) --- The notes associated with the workload. For a review template, these are the notes that will be associated with the workload when the template is applied.

parameters.name: JiraConfiguration
parameters.description: Configuration of the Jira integration. SelectedPillars (list) --- Selected pillars in the workload. (dict) --- The selected pillar. PillarId (string) --- The ID used to identify a pillar, for example, security. A pillar is identified by its  PillarReviewSummary$PillarId. SelectedQuestionIds (list) --- Selected question IDs in the selected pillar. (string) ---

nested_params.name: PillarId
nested_params.description: The ID used to identify a pillar, for example, security. A pillar is identified by its  PillarReviewSummary$PillarId.

nested_params.name: SelectedQuestionIds
nested_params.description: Selected question IDs in the selected pillar.

nested_items.name: WorkloadId
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the workload. This ID is unique within an Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: LensReview
nested_items.description: A lens review of a question.

nested_items.name: LensName
nested_items.description: The full name of the lens.

nested_items.name: PillarReviewSummaries
nested_items.description: List of pillar review summaries of lens review in a workload.

nested_items.name: PillarId
nested_items.description: The ID used to identify a pillar, for example, security.

nested_items.name: Notes
nested_items.description: The notes associated with the workload.

nested_items.name: RiskCounts
nested_items.description: A map from risk names to the count of how many questions have that rating.

nested_items.name: PrioritizedRiskCounts
nested_items.description: A map from risk names to the count of how many questions have that rating.

nested_items.name: JiraConfiguration
nested_items.description: Jira configuration status of the Lens review.

nested_items.name: PillarId
nested_items.description: The ID used to identify a pillar, for example, security.

nested_items.name: SelectedQuestionIds
nested_items.description: Selected question IDs in the selected pillar.

nested_items.name: Notes
nested_items.description: The notes associated with the workload.

nested_items.name: RiskCounts
nested_items.description: A map from risk names to the count of how many questions have that rating.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next set of results.

nested_items.name: Profiles
nested_items.description: The profiles associated with the workload.

nested_items.name: PrioritizedRiskCounts
nested_items.description: A map from risk names to the count of how many questions have that rating.
